# Complete YAML Reference

This page provides a comprehensive reference for all the configuration options available in the YAML frontmatter of your `.qmd` file.

## Document Metadata

### `title`
The main title for the generated PDF document properties.
**Type:** String

### `author`
A nested object containing information about you.
**Fields:**
*   `firstname`: Your first name.
*   `lastname`: Your last name.
*   `contact`: List of contact details (see below).
*   `socialmedia`: List of social media profiles (see below).

#### `author.contact` / `author.socialmedia`
Lists of objects with:
*   `icon`: Font Awesome icon class (e.g., `fa envelope`, `fa brands github`).
*   `text`: Display text.
*   `url`: (Optional) Hyperlink URL.

### `position`
Your current title or the position you are applying for. Displayed on the Title Page.
**Type:** String

### `profile-photo`
Path to your profile photo relative to the project root. Set to `""` or `null` to disable.
**Type:** String

### `aboutme`
A short bio paragraph displayed on the CV title page.
**Type:** String (multiline)

### `famous-quote`
An optional quote displayed on the CV.
**Fields:**
*   `text`: The quote text.
*   `attribution`: The author of the quote.

## Cover Letter Configuration

### `recipient`
Information about the addressee.
**Fields:**
*   `name`: Full name.
*   `salutation`: Formal salutation (e.g., "Dear Dr. Smith,").
*   `address`: Street address.
*   `city`: City.
*   `zip`: Postal code.

### `date`
The date string for the cover letter.
**Type:** String

### `subject`
The subject line of the cover letter.
**Type:** String

## Data Integration (`google-document`)

Configures the connection to Google Sheets.

**Fields:**
*   `auth-email`: The Google email address to use for authentication.
*   `document-identifier`: The name or ID of the Google Sheet.
*   `sheets-to-load`: A list of sheets to import.
    *   `name`: The exact name of the tab in the Google Sheet.
    *   `shortname`: The unique ID used in `{{< cv-section >}}` shortcodes.

**Example:**
```yaml
google-document:
  auth-email: "me@gmail.com"
  document-identifier: "My_CV_Data"
  sheets-to-load:
    - name: "Working Experiences"
      shortname: "working"
```

## Publication List (`publication-list`)

Configures the automated publication list generation.

**Fields:**
*   `bib_file`: Path to the bibliography file (BibTeX, CSL-JSON, RIS, etc.). Can be a list of files.
*   `bib_style`: Path to the CSL style file.
*   `author_name`: The name to highlight in the author list (e.g., "Doe, J.").
*   `highlight_author`: Styling for the highlighted name. Options: `"bold"`, `"italic"`, `"color"`, or a custom Typst string (e.g., `#strong[%s]`).
*   `group_labels`: Custom titles for publication groups (e.g., `article: "Journal Papers"`).
*   `group_order`: Ordered list of group keys (e.g., `["article", "conference"]`).

## Output Options

### `render-output`
Controls which documents are generated.
**Options:** `"cv-only"`, `"letter-only"`, `"combined"`.

### `attachments`
A list of images to append as pages at the end of the PDF.
**Fields:**
*   `name`: Display name (internal use).
*   `file`: Path to the image file.

### `style`
Customize the visual appearance.
**Fields:**
*   `color-accent`: Hex code for the accent color (no `#` prefix required, but supported).
*   `font-header`: Font family for headings (e.g., `"Lato"`).
*   `font-text`: Font family for body text (e.g., `"Roboto"`).
